Our intern reused a prime when generating the RSA keys. Can you recover my secret message? Ciphertext: 817234537685436141155048054372346187033894969088965018187345200235537060095982205894738877832665248625580107483500620641893795843201781699628646148371365409955901982973165214674132798363324985465077189808077252480748016285786385084

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1173219915785270537352487842329078231821398747258629966240005201271897291528592137876720944374148322224676587442449423126929795866137339948778767362050478130828244696462724716913136623813832289078774640931812191695748994086206286521, e=180048758845454346169919092917782170854733836481700623755371915823875431850737787095623047721039788095154182967945429664502432482905022093065414144247453635008745580109606923332357551976886306363755229680745974154224015744793494417

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{kp98z4af}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 817234537685436141155048054372346187033894969088965018187345200235537060095982205894738877832665248625580107483500620641893795843201781699628646148371365409955901982973165214674132798363324985465077189808077252480748016285786385084
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1173219915785270537352487842329078231821398747258629966240005201271897291528592137876720944374148322224676587442449423126929795866137339948778767362050478130828244696462724716913136623813832289078774640931812191695748994086206286521, e=180048758845454346169919092917782170854733836481700623755371915823875431850737787095623047721039788095154182967945429664502432482905022093065414144247453635008745580109606923332357551976886306363755229680745974154224015744793494417
extra_info: p=34252297963571298720241158204906058475796693397518265217323263932597060560574702647277111669620763246879811648717461, q=34252297963571298720241158204906058475796693397518265217323263932597060560574702647277111669620763246879811648717461, Ï†(n)=1173219915785270537352487842329078231821398747258629966240005201271897291528592137876720944374148322224676587442449354622333868723539899466462357549933526537441449659932290070385271429692711139673480086708472950169255234462908851600
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
